about_the_game:
《Five Nights And VTBs》is a survival horror game that focuses on money management. Use only $100 per day to pushes ten VTBs，How do you allocate gifts to each VTB and your own cost of living?

Why did you ignore me in my liveing room？


Remember to pay for friendship to keep your love fresh.

I've graduated, and you're not going to watch VTB anymore, are you?

[/img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/盯.gif[/img]
Remember,she is always with you,Be mindful of your words and actions.

Why? Why did you appear in other's broadcast room?

[/img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/20.gif[/img]
Note that friendship between girls does not mean that they are willing to share your love.

Game Features:

a
Ten cute VTBs with very different styles,but no less dangerous.
Custom levels. You can watch the live broadcast at a leisurely pace. You can also experience the tension of a bomb disposal expert


rouge mode. Gradually explore the dangers of VTBs by you play.[/img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/等级设置.png[/img]
detailed_description:
《Five Nights And VTBs》is a survival horror game that focuses on money management. Use only $100 per day to pushes ten VTBs，How do you allocate gifts to each VTB and your own cost of living?

Why did you ignore me in my liveing room？


Remember to pay for friendship to keep your love fresh.

I've graduated, and you're not going to watch VTB anymore, are you?

[/img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/盯.gif[/img]
Remember,she is always with you,Be mindful of your words and actions.

Why? Why did you appear in other's broadcast room?

[/img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/20.gif[/img]
Note that friendship between girls does not mean that they are willing to share your love.

Game Features:

a
Ten cute VTBs with very different styles,but no less dangerous.
Custom levels. You can watch the live broadcast at a leisurely pace. You can also experience the tension of a bomb disposal expert


rouge mode. Gradually explore the dangers of VTBs by you play.[/img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/等级设置.png[/img]

short_description: Experience a week of life as a VTB fans in FNAV. Spending unforgettable nights with lovely VTBs. Exercise maximum caution. Don't be discovered that you have already cheated.
